generalComments1: generalComments are to tell the developer about some things in this file, and are not referenced in the game logic.
generalComments2: usedOn.objectUseWith1 can be another object or the screenId that an exit leads to
generalComments3: usedOn.useTogetherLocation can be a screenId or an object/npc if two elements can be used together anywhere, but they must both point to each other for this to work.
generalComments4: Doors: alreadyUsed will map to whether or not a locked door is opened.  False, the door is locked, True, it is unlocked, and this should always match the status field in the navigation screen for the exit
generalComments5: Doors: activeStatus refers to whether the state of the door is open or closed, and does not relate to whether it is locked. true is open, false is closed
generalComments6: canHover: Can be set to false and will stop user hovering and interacting for example object in canvas but invisible until they push something or look at something etc, can make not hoverable and add a blank png and replace it when it should become visible
generalComments7: name property of an object cannot have its last word as the same as another objects name ie one object is hook you can not use rope and hook, and check other languages too

objectDoorLibraryFoyerResearchRoom.comment: door from libraryFoyer to researchRoom, opened by using objectKeyResearchRoom on it

objectKeyResearchRoom.comment: Key for unlocking door to researchRoom from libraryFoyer

objectPileOfBooksLibraryFoyer.comment: Pile of books you use or push or pull to get the key for the research room

objectParrotFlyer.comment: place over top of mirror and show when user takes mirror

objectParrotMirror.comment: Key for unlocking door to researchRoom from libraryFoyer

objectCarrot.comment: Give carrot to donkey in order to show objectDonkeyRope and move the donkey so can access barn

objectDonkeyFake.comment: Object instance of Donkey npc that can be used to show the rope, the space after the name is important or the code wont work

objectParrotHook.comment: Key for unlocking door to researchRoom from libraryFoyer
